rooms.description: Welcoming entrance with Vastu optimized layout ensuring positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Scandinavian style living room with floor-to-ceiling windows offering panoramic views and abundant natural light. The seating area is designed in accordance with Vastu principles for a harmonious ambiance.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Modern dining area integrated within the living space; minimalistic design reflecting Scandinavian aesthetics.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Open plan kitchen with floor-to-ceiling windows and ample storage adhering to both local building codes and Vastu guidelines for the placement of appliances.

rooms.name: Bathroom (Guest)
rooms.description: Compact bathroom ensuring efficient use of space; designed per local norms and minimalistic Scandinavian style.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Dedicated private gym area with soundproofing, equipped for a range of exercise equipment. Designed to maintain privacy from the main living areas and integrated seamlessly with overall design.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: State-of-the-art home theater featuring ambient lighting and acoustic treatment; floor-to-ceiling windows on one side to maintain a balanced interior-exterior connection in line with Vastu.
